breadCrumbs.text: How will you build 2-stage further competition

title: How will you build your bid pack?
subtitle: Please note that you'll be given the option to download a ranked list of suppliers at the end of your capability assessment and run your further competition outside our service if you wish to do so.

form.question: How would you like to include your requirements document (attachment 3)?

hint.text: Enter all the information needed to build your two stage further competition online and submit it to your selected suppliers.

items.text: Upload only your statement of requirements but finish the bid pack online

hint.text: Use this option to upload attachement and complete the assessment online.

form.question: How would you like to include your evaluation document (attachment 2)?

hint.text: Enter all the information needed to build your two stage further competition online and submit it to your selected suppliers.

items.text: Upload only your statement of requirements but finish the bid pack online

hint.text: Use this option to upload attachement and complete the assessment online.
